column5: Has anyone spent any time at the Indiaonta Resort on Calm Lake, or Anderson's Manitou Falls Camp at Ear Falls? How are the accomodations? Thank you for your response. Iron Horse
Iron Horse, You might get a better results by posting this under General Discussion. Brad
I have fished Wabaskang lake in the Ear Falls area. Fishing was top notch. There are 4 or so different lodges operating on that lake. I have not stayed at either of the lodges you mention.
